dcterms:description: A dataset comprising sentences structured as '<name> is <description>' (or the reverse), created to evaluate the reversal curse in large language models. The dataset includes 3,600 training samples and various test tasks to assess model performance on name-to-description and description-to-name mappings.
dcterms:title: Fictitious Celebrities and Descriptions Dataset
